price: 54. Maka (Fir'aun) dengan perkataan itu mempengaruhi kaumnya, sehingga mereka patuh kepadanya. Sungguh, mereka adalah kaum yang fasik.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَخَفَّ قَوۡمَهُۥ فَأَطَاعُوهُۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-is'takhaffa qawmahu fa-aṭāʿūhu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
